00089 /* render flow
00090  *
00091  * 1) Initialize state
00092  * - state data, tables
00093  * - movie/image file init
00094  * - everything that doesn't change during animation
00095  *
00096  * 2) Initialize data
00097  * - camera, world, matrices
00098  * - make render verts, faces, halos, strands
00099  * - everything can change per frame/field
00100  *
00101  * 3) Render Processor
00102  * - multiple layers
00103  * - tiles, rect, baking
00104  * - layers/tiles optionally to disk or directly in Render Result
00105  *
00106  * 4) Composite Render Result
00107  * - also read external files etc
00108  *
00109  * 5) Image Files
00110  * - save file or append in movie
00111  *
00112  */
00113 
00114

00145 static void stats_background(void *UNUSED(arg), RenderStats *rs)
00146 {
00147     uintptr_t mem_in_use, mmap_in_use, peak_memory;
00148     float megs_used_memory, mmap_used_memory, megs_peak_memory;
00149 
00150     mem_in_use= MEM_get_memory_in_use();
00151     mmap_in_use= MEM_get_mapped_memory_in_use();
00152     peak_memory = MEM_get_peak_memory();
00153 
00154     megs_used_memory= (mem_in_use-mmap_in_use)/(1024.0*1024.0);
00155     mmap_used_memory= (mmap_in_use)/(1024.0*1024.0);
00156     megs_peak_memory = (peak_memory)/(1024.0*1024.0);
00157 
00158     fprintf(stdout, "Fra:%d Mem:%.2fM (%.2fM, peak %.2fM) ", rs->cfra,
00159             megs_used_memory, mmap_used_memory, megs_peak_memory);
00160 
00161     if (rs->curfield)
00162         fprintf(stdout, "Field %d ", rs->curfield);
00163     if (rs->curblur)
00164         fprintf(stdout, "Blur %d ", rs->curblur);
00165 
00166     if (rs->infostr) {
00167         fprintf(stdout, "| %s", rs->infostr);
00168     }
00169     else {
00170         if (rs->tothalo)
00171             fprintf(stdout, "Sce: %s Ve:%d Fa:%d Ha:%d La:%d", rs->scenename, rs->totvert, rs->totface, rs->tothalo, rs->totlamp);
00172         else
00173             fprintf(stdout, "Sce: %s Ve:%d Fa:%d La:%d", rs->scenename, rs->totvert, rs->totface, rs->totlamp);
00174     }
00175 
00176     BLI_exec_cb(G.main, NULL, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_STATS);
00177 
00178     fputc('\n', stdout);
00179     fflush(stdout);
00180 }

00187 float *RE_RenderLayerGetPass(RenderLayer *rl, int passtype)
00188 {
00189     RenderPass *rpass;
00190     
00191     for (rpass=rl->passes.first; rpass; rpass= rpass->next)
00192         if (rpass->passtype== passtype)
00193             return rpass->rect;
00194     return NULL;
00195 }

00197 RenderLayer *RE_GetRenderLayer(RenderResult *rr, const char *name)
00198 {
00199     RenderLayer *rl;
00200     
00201     if (rr==NULL) return NULL;
00202     
00203     for (rl= rr->layers.first; rl; rl= rl->next)
00204         if (strncmp(rl->name, name, RE_MAXNAME)==0)
00205             return rl;
00206     return NULL;
00207 }

00224 static int render_scene_needs_vector(Render *re)
00225 {
00226     SceneRenderLayer *srl;
00227     
00228     for (srl= re->scene->r.layers.first; srl; srl= srl->next)
00229         if (!(srl->layflag & SCE_LAY_DISABLE))
00230             if (srl->passflag & SCE_PASS_VECTOR)
00231                 return 1;
00232 
00233     return 0;
00234 }

00238 Render *RE_GetRender(const char *name)
00239 {
00240     Render *re;
00241 
00242     /* search for existing renders */
00243     for (re= RenderGlobal.renderlist.first; re; re= re->next)
00244         if (strncmp(re->name, name, RE_MAXNAME)==0)
00245             break;
00246 
00247     return re;
00248 }

00294 /* fill provided result struct with what's currently active or done */
00295 void RE_AcquireResultImage(Render *re, RenderResult *rr)
00296 {
00297     memset(rr, 0, sizeof(RenderResult));
00298 
00299     if (re) {
00300         BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_READ);
00301 
00302         if (re->result) {
00303             RenderLayer *rl;
00304             
00305             rr->rectx= re->result->rectx;
00306             rr->recty= re->result->recty;
00307             
00308             rr->rectf= re->result->rectf;
00309             rr->rectz= re->result->rectz;
00310             rr->rect32= re->result->rect32;
00311             
00312             /* active layer */
00313             rl= render_get_active_layer(re, re->result);
00314 
00315             if (rl) {
00316                 if (rr->rectf==NULL)
00317                     rr->rectf= rl->rectf;
00318                 if (rr->rectz==NULL)
00319                     rr->rectz= RE_RenderLayerGetPass(rl, SCE_PASS_Z);   
00320             }
00321 
00322             rr->have_combined= (re->result->rectf != NULL);
00323             rr->layers= re->result->layers;
00324         }
00325     }
00326 }
00327 
00328 void RE_ReleaseResultImage(Render *re)
00329 {
00330     if (re)
00331         BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00332 }

00334 /* caller is responsible for allocating rect in correct size! */
00335 void RE_ResultGet32(Render *re, unsigned int *rect)
00336 {
00337     RenderResult rres;
00338     
00339     RE_AcquireResultImage(re, &rres);
00340     render_result_rect_get_pixels(&rres, &re->r, rect, re->rectx, re->recty);
00341     RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
00342 }

00349 Render *RE_NewRender(const char *name)
00350 {
00351     Render *re;
00352 
00353     /* only one render per name exists */
00354     re= RE_GetRender(name);
00355     if (re==NULL) {
00356         
00357         /* new render data struct */
00358         re= MEM_callocN(sizeof(Render), "new render");
00359         BLI_addtail(&RenderGlobal.renderlist, re);
00360         BLI_strncpy(re->name, name, RE_MAXNAME);
00361         BLI_rw_mutex_init(&re->resultmutex);
00362     }
00363     
00364     RE_InitRenderCB(re);
00365 
00366     /* init some variables */
00367     re->ycor= 1.0f;
00368     
00369     return re;
00370 }
00371 
00372 /* called for new renders and when finishing rendering so
00373  * we always have valid callbacks on a render */
00374 void RE_InitRenderCB(Render *re)
00375 {
00376     /* set default empty callbacks */
00377     re->display_init= result_nothing;
00378     re->display_clear= result_nothing;
00379     re->display_draw= result_rcti_nothing;
00380     re->progress= float_nothing;
00381     re->test_break= default_break;
00382     if (G.background)
00383         re->stats_draw= stats_background;
00384     else
00385         re->stats_draw= stats_nothing;
00386     /* clear callback handles */
00387     re->dih= re->dch= re->ddh= re->sdh= re->prh= re->tbh= NULL;
00388 }
00389 
00390 /* only call this while you know it will remove the link too */
00391 void RE_FreeRender(Render *re)
00392 {
00393     BLI_rw_mutex_end(&re->resultmutex);
00394     
00395     free_renderdata_tables(re);
00396     free_sample_tables(re);
00397     
00398     render_result_free(re->result);
00399     render_result_free(re->pushedresult);
00400     
00401     BLI_remlink(&RenderGlobal.renderlist, re);
00402     MEM_freeN(re);
00403 }
00404 
00405 /* exit blender */
00406 void RE_FreeAllRender(void)
00407 {
00408     while (RenderGlobal.renderlist.first) {
00409         RE_FreeRender(RenderGlobal.renderlist.first);
00410     }
00411 }

00413 /* on file load, free all re */
00414 void RE_FreeAllRenderResults(void)
00415 {
00416     Render *re;
00417 
00418     for (re = RenderGlobal.renderlist.first; re; re = re->next) {
00419         render_result_free(re->result);
00420         render_result_free(re->pushedresult);
00421 
00422         re->result = NULL;
00423         re->pushedresult = NULL;
00424     }
00425 }

00430 /* what doesn't change during entire render sequence */
00431 /* disprect is optional, if NULL it assumes full window render */
00432 void RE_InitState(Render *re, Render *source, RenderData *rd, SceneRenderLayer *srl, int winx, int winy, rcti *disprect)
00433 {
00434     re->ok= TRUE;   /* maybe flag */
00435     
00436     re->i.starttime= PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00437     re->r= *rd;     /* hardcopy */
00438     
00439     re->winx= winx;
00440     re->winy= winy;
00441     if (disprect) {
00442         re->disprect= *disprect;
00443         re->rectx= disprect->xmax-disprect->xmin;
00444         re->recty= disprect->ymax-disprect->ymin;
00445     }
00446     else {
00447         re->disprect.xmin = re->disprect.ymin = 0;
00448         re->disprect.xmax = winx;
00449         re->disprect.ymax = winy;
00450         re->rectx= winx;
00451         re->recty= winy;
00452     }
00453     
00454     if (re->rectx < 2 || re->recty < 2 || (BKE_imtype_is_movie(rd->im_format.imtype) &&
00455                                           (re->rectx < 16 || re->recty < 16) )) {
00456         BKE_report(re->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image too small");
00457         re->ok= 0;
00458         return;
00459     }
00460 
00461     if ((re->r.mode & (R_OSA))==0)
00462         re->r.scemode &= ~R_FULL_SAMPLE;
00463 
00464 #ifdef WITH_OPENEXR
00465     if (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)
00466         re->r.scemode |= R_EXR_TILE_FILE;   /* enable automatic */
00467 
00468     /* Until use_border is made compatible with save_buffers/full_sample, render without the later instead of not rendering at all.*/
00469     if (re->r.mode & R_BORDER) {
00470         re->r.scemode &= ~(R_EXR_TILE_FILE|R_FULL_SAMPLE);
00471     }
00472 
00473 #else
00474     /* can't do this without openexr support */
00475     re->r.scemode &= ~(R_EXR_TILE_FILE|R_FULL_SAMPLE);
00476 #endif
00477     
00478     /* fullsample wants uniform osa levels */
00479     if (source && (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)) {
00480         /* but, if source has no full sample we disable it */
00481         if ((source->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)==0)
00482             re->r.scemode &= ~R_FULL_SAMPLE;
00483         else
00484             re->r.osa= re->osa= source->osa;
00485     }
00486     else {
00487         /* check state variables, osa? */
00488         if (re->r.mode & (R_OSA)) {
00489             re->osa= re->r.osa;
00490             if (re->osa>16) re->osa= 16;
00491         }
00492         else re->osa= 0;
00493     }
00494     
00495     if (srl) {
00496         int index = BLI_findindex(&re->r.layers, srl);
00497         if (index != -1) {
00498             re->r.actlay = index;
00499             re->r.scemode |= R_SINGLE_LAYER;
00500         }
00501     }
00502         
00503     /* always call, checks for gamma, gamma tables and jitter too */
00504     make_sample_tables(re); 
00505     
00506     /* if preview render, we try to keep old result */
00507     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00508 
00509     if (re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS) {
00510         if (re->result && re->result->rectx==re->rectx && re->result->recty==re->recty);
00511         else {
00512             render_result_free(re->result);
00513             re->result= NULL;
00514         }
00515     }
00516     else {
00517         
00518         /* make empty render result, so display callbacks can initialize */
00519         render_result_free(re->result);
00520         re->result= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderResult), "new render result");
00521         re->result->rectx= re->rectx;
00522         re->result->recty= re->recty;
00523     }
00524 
00525     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00526     
00527     /* we clip faces with a minimum of 2 pixel boundary outside of image border. see zbuf.c */
00528     re->clipcrop= 1.0f + 2.0f/(float)(re->winx>re->winy?re->winy:re->winx);
00529     
00530     re->mblur_offs = re->field_offs = 0.f;
00531     
00532     RE_init_threadcount(re);
00533 }

00535 void RE_SetWindow(Render *re, rctf *viewplane, float clipsta, float clipend)
00536 {
00537     /* re->ok flag? */
00538     
00539     re->viewplane= *viewplane;
00540     re->clipsta= clipsta;
00541     re->clipend= clipend;
00542     re->r.mode &= ~R_ORTHO;
00543 
00544     perspective_m4( re->winmat,re->viewplane.xmin, re->viewplane.xmax, re->viewplane.ymin, re->viewplane.ymax, re->clipsta, re->clipend);
00545     
00546 }
00547 
00548 void RE_SetOrtho(Render *re, rctf *viewplane, float clipsta, float clipend)
00549 {
00550     /* re->ok flag? */
00551     
00552     re->viewplane= *viewplane;
00553     re->clipsta= clipsta;
00554     re->clipend= clipend;
00555     re->r.mode |= R_ORTHO;
00556 
00557     orthographic_m4( re->winmat,re->viewplane.xmin, re->viewplane.xmax, re->viewplane.ymin, re->viewplane.ymax, re->clipsta, re->clipend);
00558 }
