00620 static int render_display_draw_enabled(Render *re)
00621 {
00622     /* don't show preprocess for previewrender sss */
00623     if (re->sss_points)
00624         return !(re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS);
00625     else
00626         return 1;
00627 }
00628 
00629 /* the main thread call, renders an entire part */
00630 static void *do_part_thread(void *pa_v)
00631 {
00632     RenderPart *pa= pa_v;
00633     
00634     /* need to return nicely all parts on esc */
00635     if (R.test_break(R.tbh)==0) {
00636         
00637         if (!R.sss_points && (R.r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE))
00638             pa->result= render_result_new_full_sample(&R, &pa->fullresult, &pa->disprect, pa->crop, RR_USE_MEM);
00639         else
00640             pa->result= render_result_new(&R, &pa->disprect, pa->crop, RR_USE_MEM);
00641 
00642         if (R.sss_points)
00643             zbufshade_sss_tile(pa);
00644         else if (R.osa)
00645             zbufshadeDA_tile(pa);
00646         else
00647             zbufshade_tile(pa);
00648         
00649         /* merge too on break! */
00650         if (R.result->exrhandle) {
00651             render_result_exr_file_merge(R.result, pa->result);
00652         }
00653         else if (render_display_draw_enabled(&R)) {
00654             /* on break, don't merge in result for preview renders, looks nicer */
00655             if (R.test_break(R.tbh) && (R.r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS));
00656             else render_result_merge(R.result, pa->result);
00657         }
00658     }
00659     
00660     pa->ready= 1;
00661     
00662     return NULL;
00663 }
00664 
00665 /* calculus for how much 1 pixel rendered should rotate the 3d geometry */
00666 /* is not that simple, needs to be corrected for errors of larger viewplane sizes */
00667 /* called in initrender.c, initparts() and convertblender.c, for speedvectors */
00668 float panorama_pixel_rot(Render *re)
00669 {
00670     float psize, phi, xfac;
00671     float borderfac= (float)(re->disprect.xmax - re->disprect.xmin) / (float)re->winx;
00672     
00673     /* size of 1 pixel mapped to viewplane coords */
00674     psize= (re->viewplane.xmax-re->viewplane.xmin)/(float)(re->winx);
00675     /* angle of a pixel */
00676     phi= atan(psize/re->clipsta);
00677     
00678     /* correction factor for viewplane shifting, first calculate how much the viewplane angle is */
00679     xfac= borderfac*((re->viewplane.xmax-re->viewplane.xmin))/(float)re->xparts;
00680     xfac= atan(0.5f*xfac/re->clipsta); 
00681     /* and how much the same viewplane angle is wrapped */
00682     psize= 0.5f*phi*((float)re->partx);
00683     
00684     /* the ratio applied to final per-pixel angle */
00685     phi*= xfac/psize;
00686     
00687     return phi;
00688 }
00689 
00690 /* call when all parts stopped rendering, to find the next Y slice */
00691 /* if slice found, it rotates the dbase */
00692 static RenderPart *find_next_pano_slice(Render *re, int *minx, rctf *viewplane)
00693 {
00694     RenderPart *pa, *best= NULL;
00695     
00696     *minx= re->winx;
00697     
00698     /* most left part of the non-rendering parts */
00699     for (pa= re->parts.first; pa; pa= pa->next) {
00700         if (pa->ready==0 && pa->nr==0) {
00701             if (pa->disprect.xmin < *minx) {
00702                 best= pa;
00703                 *minx= pa->disprect.xmin;
00704             }
00705         }
00706     }
00707             
00708     if (best) {
00709         float phi= panorama_pixel_rot(re);
00710 
00711         R.panodxp= (re->winx - (best->disprect.xmin + best->disprect.xmax) )/2;
00712         R.panodxv= ((viewplane->xmax-viewplane->xmin)*R.panodxp)/(float)(re->winx);
00713 
00714         /* shift viewplane */
00715         R.viewplane.xmin = viewplane->xmin + R.panodxv;
00716         R.viewplane.xmax = viewplane->xmax + R.panodxv;
00717         RE_SetWindow(re, &R.viewplane, R.clipsta, R.clipend);
00718         copy_m4_m4(R.winmat, re->winmat);
00719         
00720         /* rotate database according to part coordinates */
00721         project_renderdata(re, projectverto, 1, -R.panodxp*phi, 1);
00722         R.panosi= sin(R.panodxp*phi);
00723         R.panoco= cos(R.panodxp*phi);
00724     }
00725     return best;
00726 }
00727 
00728 static RenderPart *find_next_part(Render *re, int minx)
00729 {
00730     RenderPart *pa, *best= NULL;
00731 
00732     /* long long int's needed because of overflow [#24414] */
00733     long long int centx=re->winx/2, centy=re->winy/2, tot=1;
00734     long long int mindist= (long long int)re->winx * (long long int)re->winy;
00735     
00736     /* find center of rendered parts, image center counts for 1 too */
00737     for (pa= re->parts.first; pa; pa= pa->next) {
00738         if (pa->ready) {
00739             centx+= (pa->disprect.xmin+pa->disprect.xmax)/2;
00740             centy+= (pa->disprect.ymin+pa->disprect.ymax)/2;
00741             tot++;
00742         }
00743     }
00744     centx/=tot;
00745     centy/=tot;
00746     
00747     /* closest of the non-rendering parts */
00748     for (pa= re->parts.first; pa; pa= pa->next) {
00749         if (pa->ready==0 && pa->nr==0) {
00750             long long int distx= centx - (pa->disprect.xmin+pa->disprect.xmax)/2;
00751             long long int disty= centy - (pa->disprect.ymin+pa->disprect.ymax)/2;
00752             distx= (long long int)sqrt(distx*distx + disty*disty);
00753             if (distx<mindist) {
00754                 if (re->r.mode & R_PANORAMA) {
00755                     if (pa->disprect.xmin==minx) {
00756                         best= pa;
00757                         mindist= distx;
00758                     }
00759                 }
00760                 else {
00761                     best= pa;
00762                     mindist= distx;
00763                 }
00764             }
00765         }
00766     }
00767     return best;
00768 }
00769 
00770 static void print_part_stats(Render *re, RenderPart *pa)
00771 {
00772     char str[64];
00773     
00774     BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%s, Part %d-%d", re->scene->id.name+2, pa->nr, re->i.totpart);
00775     re->i.infostr= str;
00776     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00777     re->i.infostr= NULL;
00778 }
00779 
00780 static void threaded_tile_processor(Render *re)
00781 {
00782     ListBase threads;
00783     RenderPart *pa, *nextpa;
00784     rctf viewplane= re->viewplane;
00785     int rendering=1, counter= 1, drawtimer=0, hasdrawn, minx=0;
00786     
00787     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00788 
00789     /* first step; free the entire render result, make new, and/or prepare exr buffer saving */
00790     if (re->result==NULL || !(re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)) {
00791         render_result_free(re->result);
00792     
00793         if (re->sss_points && render_display_draw_enabled(re))
00794             re->result= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
00795         else if (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)
00796             re->result= render_result_new_full_sample(re, &re->fullresult, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_EXR);
00797         else
00798             re->result= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0,
00799                 (re->r.scemode & R_EXR_TILE_FILE)? RR_USE_EXR: RR_USE_MEM);
00800     }
00801 
00802     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00803     
00804     if (re->result==NULL)
00805         return;
00806     
00807     /* warning; no return here without closing exr file */
00808     
00809     initparts(re);
00810 
00811     if (re->result->exrhandle)
00812         render_result_exr_file_begin(re);
00813     
00814     BLI_init_threads(&threads, do_part_thread, re->r.threads);
00815     
00816     /* assuming no new data gets added to dbase... */
00817     R= *re;
00818     
00819     /* set threadsafe break */
00820     R.test_break= thread_break;
00821     
00822     /* timer loop demands to sleep when no parts are left, so we enter loop with a part */
00823     if (re->r.mode & R_PANORAMA)
00824         nextpa= find_next_pano_slice(re, &minx, &viewplane);
00825     else
00826         nextpa= find_next_part(re, 0);
00827     
00828     while (rendering) {
00829         
00830         if (re->test_break(re->tbh))
00831             PIL_sleep_ms(50);
00832         else if (nextpa && BLI_available_threads(&threads)) {
00833             drawtimer= 0;
00834             nextpa->nr= counter++;  /* for nicest part, and for stats */
00835             nextpa->thread= BLI_available_thread_index(&threads);   /* sample index */
00836             BLI_insert_thread(&threads, nextpa);
00837 
00838             nextpa= find_next_part(re, minx);
00839         }
00840         else if (re->r.mode & R_PANORAMA) {
00841             if (nextpa==NULL && BLI_available_threads(&threads)==re->r.threads)
00842                 nextpa= find_next_pano_slice(re, &minx, &viewplane);
00843             else {
00844                 PIL_sleep_ms(50);
00845                 drawtimer++;
00846             }
00847         }
00848         else {
00849             PIL_sleep_ms(50);
00850             drawtimer++;
00851         }
00852         
00853         /* check for ready ones to display, and if we need to continue */
00854         rendering= 0;
00855         hasdrawn= 0;
00856         for (pa= re->parts.first; pa; pa= pa->next) {
00857             if (pa->ready) {
00858                 
00859                 BLI_remove_thread(&threads, pa);
00860                 
00861                 if (pa->result) {
00862                     if (render_display_draw_enabled(re))
00863                         re->display_draw(re->ddh, pa->result, NULL);
00864                     print_part_stats(re, pa);
00865                     
00866                     render_result_free_list(&pa->fullresult, pa->result);
00867                     pa->result= NULL;
00868                     re->i.partsdone++;
00869                     re->progress(re->prh, re->i.partsdone / (float)re->i.totpart);
00870                     hasdrawn= 1;
00871                 }
00872             }
00873             else {
00874                 rendering= 1;
00875                 if (pa->nr && pa->result && drawtimer>20) {
00876                     if (render_display_draw_enabled(re))
00877                         re->display_draw(re->ddh, pa->result, &pa->result->renrect);
00878                     hasdrawn= 1;
00879                 }
00880             }
00881         }
00882         if (hasdrawn)
00883             drawtimer= 0;
00884 
00885         /* on break, wait for all slots to get freed */
00886         if ( (g_break=re->test_break(re->tbh)) && BLI_available_threads(&threads)==re->r.threads)
00887             rendering= 0;
00888         
00889     }
00890     
00891     if (re->result->exrhandle) {
00892         BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00893         render_result_exr_file_end(re);
00894         BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00895     }
00896     
00897     /* unset threadsafety */
00898     g_break= 0;
00899     
00900     BLI_end_threads(&threads);
00901     freeparts(re);
00902     re->viewplane= viewplane; /* restore viewplane, modified by pano render */
00903 }
00904 
00905 /* currently only called by preview renders and envmap */
00906 void RE_TileProcessor(Render *re)
00907 {
00908     threaded_tile_processor(re);
00909 }
00910 
00911 /* ************  This part uses API, for rendering Blender scenes ********** */
00912 
00913 static void do_render_3d(Render *re)
00914 {
00915     /* try external */
00916     if (RE_engine_render(re, 0))
00917         return;
00918 
00919     /* internal */
00920     
00921 //  re->cfra= cfra; /* <- unused! */
00922     re->scene->r.subframe = re->mblur_offs + re->field_offs;
00923     
00924     /* lock drawing in UI during data phase */
00925     if (re->draw_lock)
00926         re->draw_lock(re->dlh, 1);
00927     
00928     /* make render verts/faces/halos/lamps */
00929     if (render_scene_needs_vector(re))
00930         RE_Database_FromScene_Vectors(re, re->main, re->scene, re->lay);
00931     else
00932         RE_Database_FromScene(re, re->main, re->scene, re->lay, 1);
00933     
00934     /* clear UI drawing locks */
00935     if (re->draw_lock)
00936         re->draw_lock(re->dlh, 0);
00937     
00938     threaded_tile_processor(re);
00939     
00940     /* do left-over 3d post effects (flares) */
00941     if (re->flag & R_HALO)
00942         if (!re->test_break(re->tbh))
00943             add_halo_flare(re);
00944     
00945     /* free all render verts etc */
00946     RE_Database_Free(re);
00947     
00948     re->scene->r.subframe = 0.f;
00949 }
00950 
00951 /* called by blur loop, accumulate RGBA key alpha */
00952 static void addblur_rect_key(RenderResult *rr, float *rectf, float *rectf1, float blurfac)
00953 {
00954     float mfac= 1.0f - blurfac;
00955     int a, b, stride= 4*rr->rectx;
00956     int len= stride*sizeof(float);
00957     
00958     for (a=0; a<rr->recty; a++) {
00959         if (blurfac==1.0f) {
00960             memcpy(rectf, rectf1, len);
00961         }
00962         else {
00963             float *rf= rectf, *rf1= rectf1;
00964             
00965             for ( b= rr->rectx; b>0; b--, rf+=4, rf1+=4) {
00966                 if (rf1[3]<0.01f)
00967                     rf[3]= mfac*rf[3];
00968                 else if (rf[3]<0.01f) {
00969                     rf[0]= rf1[0];
00970                     rf[1]= rf1[1];
00971                     rf[2]= rf1[2];
00972                     rf[3]= blurfac*rf1[3];
00973                 }
00974                 else {
00975                     rf[0]= mfac*rf[0] + blurfac*rf1[0];
00976                     rf[1]= mfac*rf[1] + blurfac*rf1[1];
00977                     rf[2]= mfac*rf[2] + blurfac*rf1[2];
00978                     rf[3]= mfac*rf[3] + blurfac*rf1[3];
00979                 }               
00980             }
00981         }
00982         rectf+= stride;
00983         rectf1+= stride;
00984     }
00985 }
00986 
00987 /* called by blur loop, accumulate renderlayers */
00988 static void addblur_rect(RenderResult *rr, float *rectf, float *rectf1, float blurfac, int channels)
00989 {
00990     float mfac= 1.0f - blurfac;
00991     int a, b, stride= channels*rr->rectx;
00992     int len= stride*sizeof(float);
00993     
00994     for (a=0; a<rr->recty; a++) {
00995         if (blurfac==1.0f) {
00996             memcpy(rectf, rectf1, len);
00997         }
00998         else {
00999             float *rf= rectf, *rf1= rectf1;
01000             
01001             for ( b= rr->rectx*channels; b>0; b--, rf++, rf1++) {
01002                 rf[0]= mfac*rf[0] + blurfac*rf1[0];
01003             }
01004         }
01005         rectf+= stride;
01006         rectf1+= stride;
01007     }
01008 }
01009 
01010 
01011 /* called by blur loop, accumulate renderlayers */
01012 static void merge_renderresult_blur(RenderResult *rr, RenderResult *brr, float blurfac, int key_alpha)
01013 {
01014     RenderLayer *rl, *rl1;
01015     RenderPass *rpass, *rpass1;
01016     
01017     rl1= brr->layers.first;
01018     for (rl= rr->layers.first; rl && rl1; rl= rl->next, rl1= rl1->next) {
01019         
01020         /* combined */
01021         if (rl->rectf && rl1->rectf) {
01022             if (key_alpha)
01023                 addblur_rect_key(rr, rl->rectf, rl1->rectf, blurfac);
01024             else
01025                 addblur_rect(rr, rl->rectf, rl1->rectf, blurfac, 4);
01026         }
01027         
01028         /* passes are allocated in sync */
01029         rpass1= rl1->passes.first;
01030         for (rpass= rl->passes.first; rpass && rpass1; rpass= rpass->next, rpass1= rpass1->next) {
01031             addblur_rect(rr, rpass->rect, rpass1->rect, blurfac, rpass->channels);
01032         }
01033     }
01034 }
01035 
01036 /* main blur loop, can be called by fields too */
01037 static void do_render_blur_3d(Render *re)
01038 {
01039     RenderResult *rres;
01040     float blurfac;
01041     int blur= re->r.mblur_samples;
01042     
01043     /* create accumulation render result */
01044     rres= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
01045     
01046     /* do the blur steps */
01047     while (blur--) {
01048         re->mblur_offs = re->r.blurfac*((float)(re->r.mblur_samples-blur))/(float)re->r.mblur_samples;
01049         
01050         re->i.curblur= re->r.mblur_samples-blur;    /* stats */
01051         
01052         do_render_3d(re);
01053         
01054         blurfac= 1.0f/(float)(re->r.mblur_samples-blur);
01055         
01056         merge_renderresult_blur(rres, re->result, blurfac, re->r.alphamode & R_ALPHAKEY);
01057         if (re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
01058     }
01059     
01060     /* swap results */
01061     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01062     render_result_free(re->result);
01063     re->result= rres;
01064     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01065     
01066     re->mblur_offs = 0.0f;
01067     re->i.curblur= 0;   /* stats */
01068     
01069     /* weak... the display callback wants an active renderlayer pointer... */
01070     re->result->renlay= render_get_active_layer(re, re->result);
01071     re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);    
01072 }
01073 
01074 
01075 /* function assumes rectf1 and rectf2 to be half size of rectf */
01076 static void interleave_rect(RenderResult *rr, float *rectf, float *rectf1, float *rectf2, int channels)
01077 {
01078     int a, stride= channels*rr->rectx;
01079     int len= stride*sizeof(float);
01080     
01081     for (a=0; a<rr->recty; a+=2) {
01082         memcpy(rectf, rectf1, len);
01083         rectf+= stride;
01084         rectf1+= stride;
01085         memcpy(rectf, rectf2, len);
01086         rectf+= stride;
01087         rectf2+= stride;
01088     }
01089 }
01090 
01091 /* merge render results of 2 fields */
01092 static void merge_renderresult_fields(RenderResult *rr, RenderResult *rr1, RenderResult *rr2)
01093 {
01094     RenderLayer *rl, *rl1, *rl2;
01095     RenderPass *rpass, *rpass1, *rpass2;
01096     
01097     rl1= rr1->layers.first;
01098     rl2= rr2->layers.first;
01099     for (rl= rr->layers.first; rl && rl1 && rl2; rl= rl->next, rl1= rl1->next, rl2= rl2->next) {
01100         
01101         /* combined */
01102         if (rl->rectf && rl1->rectf && rl2->rectf)
01103             interleave_rect(rr, rl->rectf, rl1->rectf, rl2->rectf, 4);
01104         
01105         /* passes are allocated in sync */
01106         rpass1= rl1->passes.first;
01107         rpass2= rl2->passes.first;
01108         for (rpass= rl->passes.first; rpass && rpass1 && rpass2; rpass= rpass->next, rpass1= rpass1->next, rpass2= rpass2->next) {
01109             interleave_rect(rr, rpass->rect, rpass1->rect, rpass2->rect, rpass->channels);
01110         }
01111     }
01112 }
01113 
01114 
01115 /* interleaves 2 frames */
01116 static void do_render_fields_3d(Render *re)
01117 {
01118     Object *camera= RE_GetCamera(re);
01119     RenderResult *rr1, *rr2= NULL;
01120     
01121     /* no render result was created, we can safely halve render y */
01122     re->winy /= 2;
01123     re->recty /= 2;
01124     re->disprect.ymin /= 2;
01125     re->disprect.ymax /= 2;
01126     
01127     re->i.curfield= 1;  /* stats */
01128     
01129     /* first field, we have to call camera routine for correct aspect and subpixel offset */
01130     RE_SetCamera(re, camera);
01131     if (re->r.mode & R_MBLUR && (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)==0)
01132         do_render_blur_3d(re);
01133     else
01134         do_render_3d(re);
01135 
01136     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01137     rr1= re->result;
01138     re->result= NULL;
01139     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01140     
01141     /* second field */
01142     if (!re->test_break(re->tbh)) {
01143         
01144         re->i.curfield= 2;  /* stats */
01145         
01146         re->flag |= R_SEC_FIELD;
01147         if ((re->r.mode & R_FIELDSTILL)==0) {
01148             re->field_offs = 0.5f;
01149         }
01150         RE_SetCamera(re, camera);
01151         if (re->r.mode & R_MBLUR && (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)==0)
01152             do_render_blur_3d(re);
01153         else
01154             do_render_3d(re);
01155         re->flag &= ~R_SEC_FIELD;
01156         
01157         re->field_offs = 0.0f;
01158         
01159         rr2= re->result;
01160     }
01161     
01162     /* allocate original height new buffers */
01163     re->winy *= 2;
01164     re->recty *= 2;
01165     re->disprect.ymin *= 2;
01166     re->disprect.ymax *= 2;
01167 
01168     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01169     re->result= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
01170 
01171     if (rr2) {
01172         if (re->r.mode & R_ODDFIELD)
01173             merge_renderresult_fields(re->result, rr2, rr1);
01174         else
01175             merge_renderresult_fields(re->result, rr1, rr2);
01176         
01177         render_result_free(rr2);
01178     }
01179 
01180     render_result_free(rr1);
01181     
01182     re->i.curfield= 0;  /* stats */
01183     
01184     /* weak... the display callback wants an active renderlayer pointer... */
01185     re->result->renlay= render_get_active_layer(re, re->result);
01186 
01187     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01188 
01189     re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);
01190 }
01191 
01192 /* main render routine, no compositing */
01193 static void do_render_fields_blur_3d(Render *re)
01194 {
01195     Object *camera= RE_GetCamera(re);
01196     /* also check for camera here */
01197     if (camera == NULL) {
01198         printf("ERROR: Cannot render, no camera\n");
01199         G.afbreek= 1;
01200         return;
01201     }
01202 
01203     /* now use renderdata and camera to set viewplane */
01204     RE_SetCamera(re, camera);
01205     
01206     if (re->r.mode & R_FIELDS)
01207         do_render_fields_3d(re);
01208     else if (re->r.mode & R_MBLUR && (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)==0)
01209         do_render_blur_3d(re);
01210     else
01211         do_render_3d(re);
01212     
01213     /* when border render, check if we have to insert it in black */
01214     if (re->result) {
01215         if (re->r.mode & R_BORDER) {
01216             if ((re->r.mode & R_CROP)==0) {
01217                 RenderResult *rres;
01218                 
01219                 BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01220 
01221                 /* sub-rect for merge call later on */
01222                 re->result->tilerect= re->disprect;
01223                 
01224                 /* this copying sequence could become function? */
01225                 /* weak is: it chances disprect from border */
01226                 re->disprect.xmin = re->disprect.ymin = 0;
01227                 re->disprect.xmax = re->winx;
01228                 re->disprect.ymax = re->winy;
01229                 re->rectx= re->winx;
01230                 re->recty= re->winy;
01231                 
01232                 rres= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
01233                 
01234                 render_result_merge(rres, re->result);
01235                 render_result_free(re->result);
01236                 re->result= rres;
01237                 
01238                 /* weak... the display callback wants an active renderlayer pointer... */
01239                 re->result->renlay= render_get_active_layer(re, re->result);
01240                 
01241                 BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01242         
01243                 re->display_init(re->dih, re->result);
01244                 re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);
01245             }
01246             else {
01247                 /* set offset (again) for use in compositor, disprect was manipulated. */
01248                 re->result->xof= 0;
01249                 re->result->yof= 0;
01250             }
01251         }
01252     }
01253 }
01254 
01255 
01256 /* within context of current Render *re, render another scene.
01257  * it uses current render image size and disprect, but doesn't execute composite
01258  */
01259 static void render_scene(Render *re, Scene *sce, int cfra)
01260 {
01261     Render *resc= RE_NewRender(sce->id.name);
01262     int winx= re->winx, winy= re->winy;
01263     
01264     sce->r.cfra= cfra;
01265 
01266     scene_camera_switch_update(sce);
01267 
01268     /* exception: scene uses own size (unfinished code) */
01269     if (0) {
01270         winx= (sce->r.size*sce->r.xsch)/100;
01271         winy= (sce->r.size*sce->r.ysch)/100;
01272     }
01273     
01274     /* initial setup */
01275     RE_InitState(resc, re, &sce->r, NULL, winx, winy, &re->disprect);
01276     
01277     /* still unsure entity this... */
01278     resc->main= re->main;
01279     resc->scene= sce;
01280     resc->lay= sce->lay;
01281     
01282     /* ensure scene has depsgraph, base flags etc OK */
01283     set_scene_bg(re->main, sce);
01284 
01285     /* copy callbacks */
01286     resc->display_draw= re->display_draw;
01287     resc->ddh= re->ddh;
01288     resc->test_break= re->test_break;
01289     resc->tbh= re->tbh;
01290     resc->stats_draw= re->stats_draw;
01291     resc->sdh= re->sdh;
01292     
01293     do_render_fields_blur_3d(resc);
01294 }
01295 
01296 /* helper call to detect if this scene needs a render, or if there's a any render layer to render */
01297 static int composite_needs_render(Scene *sce, int this_scene)
01298 {
01299     bNodeTree *ntree= sce->nodetree;
01300     bNode *node;
01301     
01302     if (ntree==NULL) return 1;
01303     if (sce->use_nodes==0) return 1;
01304     if ((sce->r.scemode & R_DOCOMP)==0) return 1;
01305     
01306     for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
01307         if (node->type==CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS)
01308             if (this_scene==0 || node->id==NULL || node->id==&sce->id)
01309                 return 1;
01310     }
01311     return 0;
01312 }
01313 
01314 static void tag_scenes_for_render(Render *re)
01315 {
01316     bNode *node;
01317     Scene *sce;
01318     
01319     for (sce= re->main->scene.first; sce; sce= sce->id.next)
01320         sce->id.flag &= ~LIB_DOIT;
01321     
01322     if (RE_GetCamera(re) && composite_needs_render(re->scene, 1))
01323         re->scene->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
01324     
01325     if (re->scene->nodetree==NULL) return;
01326     
01327     /* check for render-layers nodes using other scenes, we tag them LIB_DOIT */
01328     for (node= re->scene->nodetree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
01329         if (node->type==CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS) {
01330             if (node->id) {
01331                 if (node->id != (ID *)re->scene)
01332                     node->id->flag |= LIB_DOIT;
01333             }
01334         }
01335     }
01336     
01337 }
01338 
01339 static void ntree_render_scenes(Render *re)
01340 {
01341     bNode *node;
01342     int cfra= re->scene->r.cfra;
01343     int restore_scene= 0;
01344     
01345     if (re->scene->nodetree==NULL) return;
01346     
01347     tag_scenes_for_render(re);
01348     
01349     /* now foreach render-result node tagged we do a full render */
01350     /* results are stored in a way compisitor will find it */
01351     for (node= re->scene->nodetree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
01352         if (node->type==CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS) {
01353             if (node->id && node->id != (ID *)re->scene) {
01354                 if (node->id->flag & LIB_DOIT) {
01355                     Scene *scene = (Scene*)node->id;
01356 
01357                     render_scene(re, scene, cfra);
01358                     restore_scene= (scene != re->scene);
01359                     node->id->flag &= ~LIB_DOIT;
01360                     
01361                     nodeUpdate(re->scene->nodetree, node);
01362                 }
01363             }
01364         }
01365     }
01366 
01367     /* restore scene if we rendered another last */
01368     if (restore_scene)
01369         set_scene_bg(re->main, re->scene);
01370 }
01371 
01372 /* bad call... need to think over proper method still */
01373 static void render_composit_stats(void *UNUSED(arg), char *str)
01374 {
01375     R.i.infostr= str;
01376     R.stats_draw(R.sdh, &R.i);
01377     R.i.infostr= NULL;
01378 }
01379 
01380 
01381 /* reads all buffers, calls optional composite, merges in first result->rectf */
01382 static void do_merge_fullsample(Render *re, bNodeTree *ntree)
01383 {
01384     float *rectf, filt[3][3];
01385     int sample;
01386     
01387     /* interaction callbacks */
01388     if (ntree) {
01389         ntree->stats_draw= render_composit_stats;
01390         ntree->test_break= re->test_break;
01391         ntree->progress= re->progress;
01392         ntree->sdh= re->sdh;
01393         ntree->tbh= re->tbh;
01394         ntree->prh= re->prh;
01395     }
01396     
01397     /* filtmask needs it */
01398     R= *re;
01399     
01400     /* we accumulate in here */
01401     rectf= MEM_mapallocN(re->rectx*re->recty*sizeof(float)*4, "fullsample rgba");
01402     
01403     for (sample=0; sample<re->r.osa; sample++) {
01404         Render *re1;
01405         RenderResult rres;
01406         int x, y, mask;
01407         
01408         /* enable full sample print */
01409         R.i.curfsa= sample+1;
01410         
01411         /* set all involved renders on the samplebuffers (first was done by render itself, but needs tagged) */
01412         /* also function below assumes this */
01413             
01414         tag_scenes_for_render(re);
01415         for (re1= RenderGlobal.renderlist.first; re1; re1= re1->next) {
01416             if (re1->scene->id.flag & LIB_DOIT) {
01417                 if (re1->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE) {
01418                     if (sample) {
01419                         BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01420                         render_result_exr_file_read(re1, sample);
01421                         BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01422                     }
01423                     ntreeCompositTagRender(re1->scene); /* ensure node gets exec to put buffers on stack */
01424                 }
01425             }
01426         }
01427         
01428         /* composite */
01429         if (ntree) {
01430             ntreeCompositTagRender(re->scene);
01431             ntreeCompositTagAnimated(ntree);
01432             
01433             ntreeCompositExecTree(ntree, &re->r, G.background==0);
01434         }
01435         
01436         /* ensure we get either composited result or the active layer */
01437         RE_AcquireResultImage(re, &rres);
01438         
01439         /* accumulate with filter, and clip */
01440         mask= (1<<sample);
01441         mask_array(mask, filt);
01442 
01443         for (y=0; y<re->recty; y++) {
01444             float *rf= rectf + 4*y*re->rectx;
01445             float *col= rres.rectf + 4*y*re->rectx;
01446                 
01447             for (x=0; x<re->rectx; x++, rf+=4, col+=4) {
01448                 /* clamping to 1.0 is needed for correct AA */
01449                 if (col[0]<0.0f) col[0]=0.0f; else if (col[0] > 1.0f) col[0]= 1.0f;
01450                 if (col[1]<0.0f) col[1]=0.0f; else if (col[1] > 1.0f) col[1]= 1.0f;
01451                 if (col[2]<0.0f) col[2]=0.0f; else if (col[2] > 1.0f) col[2]= 1.0f;
01452                 
01453                 add_filt_fmask_coord(filt, col, rf, re->rectx, re->recty, x, y);
01454             }
01455         }
01456         
01457         RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
01458 
01459         /* show stuff */
01460         if (sample!=re->osa-1) {
01461             /* weak... the display callback wants an active renderlayer pointer... */
01462             re->result->renlay= render_get_active_layer(re, re->result);
01463             re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);
01464         }
01465         
01466         if (re->test_break(re->tbh))
01467             break;
01468     }
01469     
01470     /* clear interaction callbacks */
01471     if (ntree) {
01472         ntree->stats_draw= NULL;
01473         ntree->test_break= NULL;
01474         ntree->progress= NULL;
01475         ntree->tbh= ntree->sdh= ntree->prh= NULL;
01476     }
01477     
01478     /* disable full sample print */
01479     R.i.curfsa= 0;
01480     
01481     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01482     if (re->result->rectf)
01483         MEM_freeN(re->result->rectf);
01484     re->result->rectf= rectf;
01485     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01486 }
01487 
01488 /* called externally, via compositor */
01489 void RE_MergeFullSample(Render *re, Main *bmain, Scene *sce, bNodeTree *ntree)
01490 {
01491     Scene *scene;
01492     bNode *node;
01493 
01494     /* default start situation */
01495     G.afbreek= 0;
01496     
01497     re->main= bmain;
01498     re->scene= sce;
01499     
01500     /* first call RE_ReadRenderResult on every renderlayer scene. this creates Render structs */
01501     
01502     /* tag scenes unread */
01503     for (scene= re->main->scene.first; scene; scene= scene->id.next)
01504         scene->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
01505     
01506     for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
01507         if (node->type==CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS) {
01508             Scene *nodescene= (Scene *)node->id;
01509             
01510             if (nodescene==NULL) nodescene= sce;
01511             if (nodescene->id.flag & LIB_DOIT) {
01512                 nodescene->r.mode |= R_OSA; /* render struct needs tables */
01513                 RE_ReadRenderResult(sce, nodescene);
01514                 nodescene->id.flag &= ~LIB_DOIT;
01515             }
01516         }
01517     }
01518     
01519     /* own render result should be read/allocated */
01520     if (re->scene->id.flag & LIB_DOIT) {
01521         RE_ReadRenderResult(re->scene, re->scene);
01522         re->scene->id.flag &= ~LIB_DOIT;
01523     }
01524     
01525     /* and now we can draw (result is there) */
01526     re->display_init(re->dih, re->result);
01527     re->display_clear(re->dch, re->result);
01528     
01529     do_merge_fullsample(re, ntree);
01530 }
01531 
01532 /* returns fully composited render-result on given time step (in RenderData) */
01533 static void do_render_composite_fields_blur_3d(Render *re)
01534 {
01535     bNodeTree *ntree= re->scene->nodetree;
01536     int update_newframe=0;
01537     
01538     /* INIT seeding, compositor can use random texture */
01539     BLI_srandom(re->r.cfra);
01540     
01541     if (composite_needs_render(re->scene, 1)) {
01542         /* save memory... free all cached images */
01543         ntreeFreeCache(ntree);
01544         
01545         do_render_fields_blur_3d(re);
01546     } 
01547     else {
01548         /* ensure new result gets added, like for regular renders */
01549         BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01550         
01551         render_result_free(re->result);
01552         re->result= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
01553 
01554         BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01555         
01556         /* scene render process already updates animsys */
01557         update_newframe = 1;
01558     }
01559     
01560     /* swap render result */
01561     if (re->r.scemode & R_SINGLE_LAYER) {
01562         BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01563         render_result_single_layer_end(re);
01564         BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01565     }
01566     
01567     if (!re->test_break(re->tbh)) {
01568         
01569         if (ntree) {
01570             ntreeCompositTagRender(re->scene);
01571             ntreeCompositTagAnimated(ntree);
01572         }
01573         
01574         if (ntree && re->scene->use_nodes && re->r.scemode & R_DOCOMP) {
01575             /* checks if there are render-result nodes that need scene */
01576             if ((re->r.scemode & R_SINGLE_LAYER)==0)
01577                 ntree_render_scenes(re);
01578             
01579             if (!re->test_break(re->tbh)) {
01580                 ntree->stats_draw= render_composit_stats;
01581                 ntree->test_break= re->test_break;
01582                 ntree->progress= re->progress;
01583                 ntree->sdh= re->sdh;
01584                 ntree->tbh= re->tbh;
01585                 ntree->prh= re->prh;
01586                 
01587                 /* in case it was never initialized */
01588                 R.sdh= re->sdh;
01589                 R.stats_draw= re->stats_draw;
01590                 
01591                 if (update_newframe)
01592                     scene_update_for_newframe(re->main, re->scene, re->lay);
01593                 
01594                 if (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)
01595                     do_merge_fullsample(re, ntree);
01596                 else {
01597                     ntreeCompositExecTree(ntree, &re->r, G.background==0);
01598                 }
01599                 
01600                 ntree->stats_draw= NULL;
01601                 ntree->test_break= NULL;
01602                 ntree->progress= NULL;
01603                 ntree->tbh= ntree->sdh= ntree->prh= NULL;
01604             }
01605         }
01606         else if (re->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE)
01607             do_merge_fullsample(re, NULL);
01608     }
01609 
01610     /* weak... the display callback wants an active renderlayer pointer... */
01611     re->result->renlay= render_get_active_layer(re, re->result);
01612     re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);
01613 }
01614 
01615 static void renderresult_stampinfo(Render *re)
01616 {
01617     RenderResult rres;
01618 
01619     /* this is the basic trick to get the displayed float or char rect from render result */
01620     RE_AcquireResultImage(re, &rres);
01621     BKE_stamp_buf(re->scene, RE_GetCamera(re), (unsigned char *)rres.rect32, rres.rectf, rres.rectx, rres.recty, 4);
01622     RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
01623 }
01624 
01625 int RE_seq_render_active(Scene *scene, RenderData *rd)
01626 {
01627     Editing *ed;
01628     Sequence *seq;
01629 
01630     ed = scene->ed;
01631     
01632     if (!(rd->scemode & R_DOSEQ) || !ed || !ed->seqbase.first)
01633         return 0;
01634     
01635     for (seq= ed->seqbase.first; seq; seq= seq->next) {
01636         if (seq->type != SEQ_SOUND)
01637             return 1;
01638     }
01639     
01640     return 0;
01641 }
01642 
01643 static void do_render_seq(Render * re)
01644 {
01645     static int recurs_depth = 0;
01646     struct ImBuf *ibuf;
01647     RenderResult *rr; /* don't assign re->result here as it might change during give_ibuf_seq */
01648     int cfra = re->r.cfra;
01649     SeqRenderData context;
01650 
01651     re->i.cfra= cfra;
01652 
01653     if (recurs_depth==0) {
01654         /* otherwise sequencer animation isn't updated */
01655         BKE_animsys_evaluate_all_animation(re->main, re->scene, (float)cfra); // XXX, was BKE_curframe(re->scene)
01656     }
01657 
01658     recurs_depth++;
01659 
01660     if ((re->r.mode & R_BORDER) && (re->r.mode & R_CROP)==0) {
01661         /* if border rendering is used and cropping is disabled, final buffer should
01662          * be as large as the whole frame */
01663         context = seq_new_render_data(re->main, re->scene,
01664                           re->winx, re->winy,
01665                           100);
01666     }
01667     else {
01668         context = seq_new_render_data(re->main, re->scene,
01669                           re->result->rectx, re->result->recty,
01670                           100);
01671     }
01672 
01673     ibuf = give_ibuf_seq(context, cfra, 0);
01674 
01675     recurs_depth--;
01676 
01677     rr = re->result;
01678     
01679     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01680 
01681     if (ibuf) {
01682         /* copy ibuf into combined pixel rect */
01683         render_result_rect_from_ibuf(rr, &re->r, ibuf);
01684         
01685         if (recurs_depth == 0) { /* with nested scenes, only free on toplevel... */
01686             Editing * ed = re->scene->ed;
01687             if (ed)
01688                 free_imbuf_seq(re->scene, &ed->seqbase, TRUE, TRUE);
01689         }
01690         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01691     }
01692     else {
01693         /* render result is delivered empty in most cases, nevertheless we handle all cases */
01694         render_result_rect_fill_zero(rr);
01695     }
01696 
01697     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01698 
01699     /* just in case this flag went missing at some point */
01700     re->r.scemode |= R_DOSEQ;
01701 
01702     /* set overall progress of sequence rendering */
01703     if (re->r.efra!=re->r.sfra)
01704         re->progress(re->prh, (float)(cfra-re->r.sfra) / (re->r.efra-re->r.sfra));
01705     else
01706         re->progress(re->prh, 1.0f);
01707 }
01708 
01709 /* ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ */
01710 
01711 /* main loop: doing sequence + fields + blur + 3d render + compositing */
01712 static void do_render_all_options(Render *re)
01713 {
01714     scene_camera_switch_update(re->scene);
01715 
01716     re->i.starttime= PIL_check_seconds_timer();
01717 
01718     /* ensure no images are in memory from previous animated sequences */
01719     BKE_image_all_free_anim_ibufs(re->r.cfra);
01720 
01721     if (RE_engine_render(re, 1)) {
01722         /* in this case external render overrides all */
01723     }
01724     else if (RE_seq_render_active(re->scene, &re->r)) {
01725         /* note: do_render_seq() frees rect32 when sequencer returns float images */
01726         if (!re->test_break(re->tbh))
01727             do_render_seq(re);
01728         
01729         re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
01730         re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);
01731     }
01732     else {
01733         do_render_composite_fields_blur_3d(re);
01734     }
01735     
01736     re->i.lastframetime= PIL_check_seconds_timer()- re->i.starttime;
01737     
01738     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
01739     
01740     /* stamp image info here */
01741     if ((re->r.stamp & R_STAMP_ALL) && (re->r.stamp & R_STAMP_DRAW)) {
01742         renderresult_stampinfo(re);
01743         re->display_draw(re->ddh, re->result, NULL);
01744     }
01745 }
01746 
01747 static int check_valid_camera(Scene *scene, Object *camera_override)
01748 {
01749     int check_comp= 1;
01750 
01751     if (camera_override == NULL && scene->camera == NULL)
01752         scene->camera= scene_find_camera(scene);
01753 
01754     if (scene->r.scemode&R_DOSEQ) {
01755         if (scene->ed) {
01756             Sequence *seq= scene->ed->seqbase.first;
01757 
01758             check_comp= 0;
01759 
01760             while (seq) {
01761                 if (seq->type == SEQ_SCENE && seq->scene) {
01762                     if (!seq->scene_camera) {
01763                         if (!seq->scene->camera && !scene_find_camera(seq->scene)) {
01764                             if (seq->scene == scene) {
01765                                 /* for current scene camera could be unneeded due to compisite nodes */
01766                                 check_comp= 1;
01767                             }
01768                             else {
01769                                 /* for other scenes camera is necessary */
01770                                 return 0;
01771                             }
01772                         }
01773                     }
01774                 }
01775 
01776                 seq= seq->next;
01777             }
01778         }
01779     }
01780 
01781     if (check_comp) { /* no sequencer or sequencer depends on compositor */
01782         if (scene->r.scemode&R_DOCOMP && scene->use_nodes) {
01783             bNode *node= scene->nodetree->nodes.first;
01784 
01785             while (node) {
01786                 if (node->type == CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS) {
01787                     Scene *sce= node->id ? (Scene*)node->id : scene;
01788 
01789                     if (!sce->camera && !scene_find_camera(sce)) {
01790                         /* all render layers nodes need camera */
01791                         return 0;
01792                     }
01793                 }
01794 
01795                 node= node->next;
01796             }
01797         }
01798         else {
01799             return (camera_override != NULL || scene->camera != NULL);
01800         }
01801     }
01802 
01803     return 1;
01804 }
01805 
01806 int RE_is_rendering_allowed(Scene *scene, Object *camera_override, ReportList *reports)
01807 {
01808     SceneRenderLayer *srl;
01809     
01810     if (scene->r.mode & R_BORDER) {
01811         if (scene->r.border.xmax <= scene->r.border.xmin ||
01812            scene->r.border.ymax <= scene->r.border.ymin) {
01813             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No border area selected.");
01814             return 0;
01815         }
01816     }
01817     
01818     if (scene->r.scemode & (R_EXR_TILE_FILE|R_FULL_SAMPLE)) {
01819         char str[FILE_MAX];
01820         
01821         render_result_exr_file_path(scene, 0, str);
01822         
01823         if (BLI_file_is_writable(str)==0) {
01824             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can not save render buffers, check the temp default path");
01825             return 0;
01826         }
01827         
01828         /* no fullsample and edge */
01829         if ((scene->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE) && (scene->r.mode & R_EDGE)) {
01830             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Full Sample doesn't support Edge Enhance");
01831             return 0;
01832         }
01833         
01834     }
01835     else
01836         scene->r.scemode &= ~R_FULL_SAMPLE; /* clear to be sure */
01837     
01838     if (scene->r.scemode & R_DOCOMP) {
01839         if (scene->use_nodes) {
01840             bNodeTree *ntree= scene->nodetree;
01841             bNode *node;
01842         
01843             if (ntree==NULL) {
01844                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No Nodetree in Scene");
01845                 return 0;
01846             }
01847             
01848             for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next)
01849                 if (node->type==CMP_NODE_COMPOSITE)
01850                     break;
01851             
01852             if (node==NULL) {
01853                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No Render Output Node in Scene");
01854                 return 0;
01855             }
01856             
01857             if (scene->r.scemode & R_FULL_SAMPLE) {
01858                 if (composite_needs_render(scene, 0)==0) {
01859                     BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Full Sample AA not supported without 3d rendering");
01860                     return 0;
01861                 }
01862             }
01863         }
01864     }
01865     
01866      /* check valid camera, without camera render is OK (compo, seq) */
01867     if (!check_valid_camera(scene, camera_override)) {
01868         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No camera");
01869         return 0;
01870     }
01871     
01872     /* get panorama & ortho, only after camera is set */
01873     object_camera_mode(&scene->r, camera_override ? camera_override : scene->camera);
01874 
01875     /* forbidden combinations */
01876     if (scene->r.mode & R_PANORAMA) {
01877         if (scene->r.mode & R_ORTHO) {
01878             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No Ortho render possible for Panorama");
01879             return 0;
01880         }
01881     }
01882 
01883     /* layer flag tests */
01884     if (scene->r.scemode & R_SINGLE_LAYER) {
01885         srl= BLI_findlink(&scene->r.layers, scene->r.actlay);
01886         /* force layer to be enabled */
01887         srl->layflag &= ~SCE_LAY_DISABLE;
01888     }
01889     
01890     for (srl= scene->r.layers.first; srl; srl= srl->next)
01891         if (!(srl->layflag & SCE_LAY_DISABLE))
01892             break;
01893     if (srl==NULL) {
01894         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "All RenderLayers are disabled");
01895         return 0;
01896     }
01897 
01898     return 1;
01899 }
01900 
01901 static void validate_render_settings(Render *re)
01902 {
01903     if (re->r.scemode & (R_EXR_TILE_FILE|R_FULL_SAMPLE)) {
01904         /* no osa + fullsample won't work... */
01905         if (re->r.osa==0)
01906             re->r.scemode &= ~R_FULL_SAMPLE;
01907     }
01908     else re->r.scemode &= ~R_FULL_SAMPLE;   /* clear to be sure */
01909 
01910     if (RE_engine_is_external(re)) {
01911         /* not supported yet */
01912         re->r.scemode &= ~(R_EXR_TILE_FILE|R_FULL_SAMPLE);
01913         re->r.mode &= ~(R_FIELDS|R_MBLUR);
01914     }
01915 }
01916 
01917 static void update_physics_cache(Render *re, Scene *scene, int UNUSED(anim_init))
01918 {
01919     PTCacheBaker baker;
01920 
01921     baker.main = re->main;
01922     baker.scene = scene;
01923     baker.pid = NULL;
01924     baker.bake = 0;
01925     baker.render = 1;
01926     baker.anim_init = 1;
01927     baker.quick_step = 1;
01928     baker.break_test = re->test_break;
01929     baker.break_data = re->tbh;
01930     baker.progressbar = NULL;
01931 
01932     BKE_ptcache_bake(&baker);
01933 }
01934 /* evaluating scene options for general Blender render */
01935 static int render_initialize_from_main(Render *re, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, SceneRenderLayer *srl, Object *camera_override, unsigned int lay, int anim, int anim_init)
01936 {
01937     int winx, winy;
01938     rcti disprect;
01939     
01940     /* r.xsch and r.ysch has the actual view window size
01941      * r.border is the clipping rect */
01942     
01943     /* calculate actual render result and display size */
01944     winx= (scene->r.size*scene->r.xsch)/100;
01945     winy= (scene->r.size*scene->r.ysch)/100;
01946     
01947     /* we always render smaller part, inserting it in larger image is compositor bizz, it uses disprect for it */
01948     if (scene->r.mode & R_BORDER) {
01949         disprect.xmin = scene->r.border.xmin*winx;
01950         disprect.xmax = scene->r.border.xmax*winx;
01951         
01952         disprect.ymin = scene->r.border.ymin*winy;
01953         disprect.ymax = scene->r.border.ymax*winy;
01954     }
01955     else {
01956         disprect.xmin = disprect.ymin = 0;
01957         disprect.xmax = winx;
01958         disprect.ymax = winy;
01959     }
01960     
01961     re->main= bmain;
01962     re->scene= scene;
01963     re->camera_override= camera_override;
01964     re->lay= lay;
01965     
01966     /* not too nice, but it survives anim-border render */
01967     if (anim) {
01968         re->disprect= disprect;
01969         return 1;
01970     }
01971     
01972     /* check all scenes involved */
01973     tag_scenes_for_render(re);
01974 
01975     /*
01976      * Disabled completely for now,
01977      * can be later set as render profile option
01978      * and default for background render.
01979      */
01980     if (0) {
01981         /* make sure dynamics are up to date */
01982         update_physics_cache(re, scene, anim_init);
01983     }
01984     
01985     if (srl || scene->r.scemode & R_SINGLE_LAYER) {
01986         BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
01987         render_result_single_layer_begin(re);
01988         BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
01989     }
01990     
01991     RE_InitState(re, NULL, &scene->r, srl, winx, winy, &disprect);
01992     if (!re->ok)  /* if an error was printed, abort */
01993         return 0;
01994     
01995     /* initstate makes new result, have to send changed tags around */
01996     ntreeCompositTagRender(re->scene);
01997 
01998     validate_render_settings(re);
01999 
02000     re->display_init(re->dih, re->result);
02001     re->display_clear(re->dch, re->result);
02002     
02003     return 1;
02004 }
02005 
02006 void RE_SetReports(Render *re, ReportList *reports)
02007 {
02008     re->reports= reports;
02009 }
02010 
02011 /* general Blender frame render call */
02012 void RE_BlenderFrame(Render *re, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, SceneRenderLayer *srl, Object *camera_override, unsigned int lay, int frame, const short write_still)
02013 {
02014     /* ugly global still... is to prevent preview events and signal subsurfs etc to make full resol */
02015     G.rendering= 1;
02016     
02017     scene->r.cfra= frame;
02018     
02019     if (render_initialize_from_main(re, bmain, scene, srl, camera_override, lay, 0, 0)) {
02020         MEM_reset_peak_memory();
02021 
02022         BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_PRE);
02023 
02024         do_render_all_options(re);
02025 
02026         if (write_still && !G.afbreek) {
02027             if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype)) {
02028                 /* operator checks this but in case its called from elsewhere */
02029                 printf("Error: cant write single images with a movie format!\n");
02030             }
02031             else {
02032                 char name[FILE_MAX];
02033                 BKE_makepicstring(name, scene->r.pic, bmain->name, scene->r.cfra, scene->r.im_format.imtype, scene->r.scemode & R_EXTENSION, FALSE);
02034 
02035                 /* reports only used for Movie */
02036                 do_write_image_or_movie(re, bmain, scene, NULL, name);
02037             }
02038         }
02039 
02040         BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_POST); /* keep after file save */
02041     }
02042 
02043     BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, G.afbreek ? BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_CANCEL : BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_COMPLETE);
02044 
02045     /* UGLY WARNING */
02046     G.rendering= 0;
02047 }
02048 
02049 static int do_write_image_or_movie(Render *re, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, bMovieHandle *mh, const char *name_override)
02050 {
02051     char name[FILE_MAX];
02052     RenderResult rres;
02053     Object *camera= RE_GetCamera(re);
02054     int ok= 1;
02055     
02056     RE_AcquireResultImage(re, &rres);
02057 
02058     /* write movie or image */
02059     if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype)) {
02060         int dofree = 0;
02061         unsigned int *rect32 = (unsigned int *)rres.rect32;
02062         /* note; the way it gets 32 bits rects is weak... */
02063         if (rres.rect32 == NULL) {
02064             rect32 = MEM_mapallocN(sizeof(int)*rres.rectx*rres.recty, "temp 32 bits rect");
02065             RE_ResultGet32(re, rect32);
02066             dofree = 1;
02067         }
02068 
02069         ok= mh->append_movie(&re->r, scene->r.sfra, scene->r.cfra, (int *)rect32,
02070                              rres.rectx, rres.recty, re->reports);
02071         if (dofree) {
02072             MEM_freeN(rect32);
02073         }
02074         printf("Append frame %d", scene->r.cfra);
02075     } 
02076     else {
02077         if (name_override)
02078             BLI_strncpy(name, name_override, sizeof(name));
02079         else
02080             BKE_makepicstring(name, scene->r.pic, bmain->name, scene->r.cfra, scene->r.im_format.imtype, scene->r.scemode & R_EXTENSION, TRUE);
02081         
02082         if (re->r.im_format.imtype==R_IMF_IMTYPE_MULTILAYER) {
02083             if (re->result) {
02084                 RE_WriteRenderResult(re->reports, re->result, name, scene->r.im_format.exr_codec);
02085                 printf("Saved: %s", name);
02086             }
02087         }
02088         else {
02089             ImBuf *ibuf= render_result_rect_to_ibuf(&rres, &scene->r);
02090 
02091             ok= BKE_write_ibuf_stamp(scene, camera, ibuf, name, &scene->r.im_format);
02092             
02093             if (ok==0) {
02094                 printf("Render error: cannot save %s\n", name);
02095             }
02096             else printf("Saved: %s", name);
02097             
02098             /* optional preview images for exr */
02099             if (ok && scene->r.im_format.imtype==R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR && (scene->r.im_format.flag & R_IMF_FLAG_PREVIEW_JPG)) {
02100                 ImageFormatData imf= scene->r.im_format;
02101                 imf.imtype= R_IMF_IMTYPE_JPEG90;
02102 
02103                 if (BLI_testextensie(name, ".exr"))
02104                     name[strlen(name)-4]= 0;
02105                 BKE_add_image_extension(name, R_IMF_IMTYPE_JPEG90);
02106                 ibuf->planes= 24;
02107                 BKE_write_ibuf_stamp(scene, camera, ibuf, name, &imf);
02108                 printf("\nSaved: %s", name);
02109             }
02110             
02111                     /* imbuf knows which rects are not part of ibuf */
02112             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02113         }
02114     }
02115     
02116     RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
02117 
02118     BLI_timestr(re->i.lastframetime, name);
02119     printf(" Time: %s", name);
02120 
02121     BLI_exec_cb(G.main, NULL, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_STATS);
02122 
02123     fputc('\n', stdout);
02124     fflush(stdout); /* needed for renderd !! (not anymore... (ton)) */
02125 
02126     return ok;
02127 }
02128 
02129 /* saves images to disk */
02130 void RE_BlenderAnim(Render *re, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *camera_override, unsigned int lay, int sfra, int efra, int tfra)
02131 {
02132     bMovieHandle *mh= BKE_get_movie_handle(scene->r.im_format.imtype);
02133     int cfrao= scene->r.cfra;
02134     int nfra, totrendered= 0, totskipped= 0;
02135     
02136     /* do not fully call for each frame, it initializes & pops output window */
02137     if (!render_initialize_from_main(re, bmain, scene, NULL, camera_override, lay, 0, 1))
02138         return;
02139     
02140     /* ugly global still... is to prevent renderwin events and signal subsurfs etc to make full resol */
02141     /* is also set by caller renderwin.c */
02142     G.rendering= 1;
02143 
02144     re->flag |= R_ANIMATION;
02145 
02146     if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype))
02147         if (!mh->start_movie(scene, &re->r, re->rectx, re->recty, re->reports))
02148             G.afbreek= 1;
02149 
02150     if (mh->get_next_frame) {
02151         while (!(G.afbreek == 1)) {
02152             int nf = mh->get_next_frame(&re->r, re->reports);
02153             if (nf >= 0 && nf >= scene->r.sfra && nf <= scene->r.efra) {
02154                 scene->r.cfra = re->r.cfra = nf;
02155 
02156                 BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_PRE);
02157 
02158                 do_render_all_options(re);
02159                 totrendered++;
02160 
02161                 if (re->test_break(re->tbh) == 0) {
02162                     if (!do_write_image_or_movie(re, bmain, scene, mh, NULL))
02163                         G.afbreek= 1;
02164                 }
02165 
02166                 if (G.afbreek == 0) {
02167                     BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_POST); /* keep after file save */
02168                 }
02169             }
02170             else {
02171                 if (re->test_break(re->tbh))
02172                     G.afbreek= 1;
02173             }
02174         }
02175     }
02176     else {
02177         for (nfra= sfra, scene->r.cfra= sfra; scene->r.cfra<=efra; scene->r.cfra++) {
02178             char name[FILE_MAX];
02179             
02180             /* only border now, todo: camera lens. (ton) */
02181             render_initialize_from_main(re, bmain, scene, NULL, camera_override, lay, 1, 0);
02182 
02183             if (nfra!=scene->r.cfra) {
02184                 /*
02185                  * Skip this frame, but update for physics and particles system.
02186                  * From convertblender.c:
02187                  * in localview, lamps are using normal layers, objects only local bits.
02188                  */
02189                 unsigned int updatelay;
02190 
02191                 if (re->lay & 0xFF000000)
02192                     updatelay= re->lay & 0xFF000000;
02193                 else
02194                     updatelay= re->lay;
02195 
02196                 scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, updatelay);
02197                 continue;
02198             }
02199             else
02200                 nfra+= tfra;
02201 
02202             /* Touch/NoOverwrite options are only valid for image's */
02203             if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype) == 0) {
02204                 if (scene->r.mode & (R_NO_OVERWRITE | R_TOUCH))
02205                     BKE_makepicstring(name, scene->r.pic, bmain->name, scene->r.cfra, scene->r.im_format.imtype, scene->r.scemode & R_EXTENSION, TRUE);
02206 
02207                 if (scene->r.mode & R_NO_OVERWRITE && BLI_exists(name)) {
02208                     printf("skipping existing frame \"%s\"\n", name);
02209                     totskipped++;
02210                     continue;
02211                 }
02212                 if (scene->r.mode & R_TOUCH && !BLI_exists(name)) {
02213                     BLI_make_existing_file(name); /* makes the dir if its not there */
02214                     BLI_file_touch(name);
02215                 }
02216             }
02217 
02218             re->r.cfra= scene->r.cfra;     /* weak.... */
02219 
02220             /* run callbacs before rendering, before the scene is updated */
02221             BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_PRE);
02222 
02223             
02224             do_render_all_options(re);
02225             totrendered++;
02226             
02227             if (re->test_break(re->tbh) == 0) {
02228                 if (!G.afbreek)
02229                     if (!do_write_image_or_movie(re, bmain, scene, mh, NULL))
02230                         G.afbreek= 1;
02231             }
02232             else
02233                 G.afbreek= 1;
02234         
02235             if (G.afbreek==1) {
02236                 /* remove touched file */
02237                 if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype) == 0) {
02238                     if (scene->r.mode & R_TOUCH && BLI_exists(name) && BLI_file_size(name) == 0) {
02239                         BLI_delete(name, 0, 0);
02240                     }
02241                 }
02242                 
02243                 break;
02244             }
02245 
02246             if (G.afbreek==0) {
02247                 BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_POST); /* keep after file save */
02248             }
02249         }
02250     }
02251     
02252     /* end movie */
02253     if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype))
02254         mh->end_movie();
02255     
02256     if (totskipped && totrendered == 0)
02257         BKE_report(re->reports, RPT_INFO, "No frames rendered, skipped to not overwrite");
02258 
02259     scene->r.cfra= cfrao;
02260 
02261     re->flag &= ~R_ANIMATION;
02262 
02263     BLI_exec_cb(re->main, (ID *)scene, G.afbreek ? BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_CANCEL : BLI_CB_EVT_RENDER_COMPLETE);
02264 
02265     /* UGLY WARNING */
02266     G.rendering= 0;
02267 }
02268 
02269 void RE_PreviewRender(Render *re, Main *bmain, Scene *sce)
02270 {
02271     Object *camera;
02272     int winx, winy;
02273 
02274     winx= (sce->r.size*sce->r.xsch)/100;
02275     winy= (sce->r.size*sce->r.ysch)/100;
02276 
02277     RE_InitState(re, NULL, &sce->r, NULL, winx, winy, NULL);
02278 
02279     re->main = bmain;
02280     re->scene = sce;
02281     re->lay = sce->lay;
02282 
02283     camera = RE_GetCamera(re);
02284     RE_SetCamera(re, camera);
02285 
02286     do_render_3d(re);
02287 }
02288 
02289 /* note; repeated win/disprect calc... solve that nicer, also in compo */
02290 
02291 /* only the temp file! */
02292 int RE_ReadRenderResult(Scene *scene, Scene *scenode)
02293 {
02294     Render *re;
02295     int winx, winy, success;
02296     rcti disprect;
02297     
02298     /* calculate actual render result and display size */
02299     winx= (scene->r.size*scene->r.xsch)/100;
02300     winy= (scene->r.size*scene->r.ysch)/100;
02301     
02302     /* only in movie case we render smaller part */
02303     if (scene->r.mode & R_BORDER) {
02304         disprect.xmin = scene->r.border.xmin*winx;
02305         disprect.xmax = scene->r.border.xmax*winx;
02306         
02307         disprect.ymin = scene->r.border.ymin*winy;
02308         disprect.ymax = scene->r.border.ymax*winy;
02309     }
02310     else {
02311         disprect.xmin = disprect.ymin = 0;
02312         disprect.xmax = winx;
02313         disprect.ymax = winy;
02314     }
02315     
02316     if (scenode)
02317         scene= scenode;
02318     
02319     /* get render: it can be called from UI with draw callbacks */
02320     re= RE_GetRender(scene->id.name);
02321     if (re==NULL)
02322         re= RE_NewRender(scene->id.name);
02323     RE_InitState(re, NULL, &scene->r, NULL, winx, winy, &disprect);
02324     re->scene= scene;
02325     
02326     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
02327     success= render_result_exr_file_read(re, 0);
02328     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
02329 
02330     return success;
02331 }
02332 
02333 void RE_set_max_threads(int threads)
02334 {
02335     if (threads==0) {
02336         RenderGlobal.threads = BLI_system_thread_count();
02337     }
02338     else if (threads>=1 && threads<=BLENDER_MAX_THREADS) {
02339         RenderGlobal.threads= threads;
02340     }
02341     else {
02342         printf("Error, threads has to be in range 0-%d\n", BLENDER_MAX_THREADS);
02343     }
02344 }
02345 
02346 void RE_init_threadcount(Render *re) 
02347 {
02348     if (RenderGlobal.threads >= 1) { /* only set as an arg in background mode */
02349         re->r.threads= MIN2(RenderGlobal.threads, BLENDER_MAX_THREADS);
02350     }
02351     else if ((re->r.mode & R_FIXED_THREADS)==0 || RenderGlobal.threads == 0) { /* Automatic threads */
02352         re->r.threads = BLI_system_thread_count();
02353     }
02354 }
02355 
02356 /* loads in image into a result, size must match
02357  * x/y offsets are only used on a partial copy when dimensions don't match */
02358 void RE_layer_load_from_file(RenderLayer *layer, ReportList *reports, const char *filename, int x, int y)
02359 {
02360     ImBuf *ibuf = IMB_loadiffname(filename, IB_rect);
02361 
02362     if (ibuf  && (ibuf->rect || ibuf->rect_float)) {
02363         if (ibuf->x == layer->rectx && ibuf->y == layer->recty) {
02364             if (ibuf->rect_float==NULL)
02365                 IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
02366 
02367             memcpy(layer->rectf, ibuf->rect_float, sizeof(float)*4*layer->rectx*layer->recty);
02368         }
02369         else {
02370             if ((ibuf->x - x >= layer->rectx) && (ibuf->y - y >= layer->recty)) {
02371                 ImBuf *ibuf_clip;
02372 
02373                 if (ibuf->rect_float==NULL)
02374                     IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
02375 
02376                 ibuf_clip = IMB_allocImBuf(layer->rectx, layer->recty, 32, IB_rectfloat);
02377                 if (ibuf_clip) {
02378                     IMB_rectcpy(ibuf_clip, ibuf, 0,0, x,y, layer->rectx, layer->recty);
02379 
02380                     memcpy(layer->rectf, ibuf_clip->rect_float, sizeof(float)*4*layer->rectx*layer->recty);
02381                     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf_clip);
02382                 }
02383                 else {
02384                     BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "RE_result_rect_from_file: failed to allocate clip buffer '%s'\n", filename);
02385                 }
02386             }
02387             else {
02388                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "RE_result_rect_from_file: incorrect dimensions for partial copy '%s'\n", filename);
02389             }
02390         }
02391 
02392         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02393     }
02394     else {
02395         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "RE_result_rect_from_file: failed to load '%s'\n", filename);
02396     }
02397 }
02398 
02399 void RE_result_load_from_file(RenderResult *result, ReportList *reports, const char *filename)
02400 {
02401     if (!render_result_exr_file_read_path(result, filename)) {
02402         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "RE_result_rect_from_file: failed to load '%s'\n", filename);
02403         return;
02404     }
02405 }
02406 
02407 const float default_envmap_layout[] = { 0,0, 1,0, 2,0, 0,1, 1,1, 2,1 };
02408 
02409 int RE_WriteEnvmapResult(struct ReportList *reports, Scene *scene, EnvMap *env, const char *relpath, const char imtype, float layout[12])
02410 {
02411     ImageFormatData imf;
02412     ImBuf *ibuf=NULL;
02413     int ok;
02414     int dx;
02415     int maxX=0,maxY=0,i=0;
02416     char filepath[FILE_MAX];
02417 
02418     if (env->cube[1]==NULL) {
02419         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "There is no generated environment map available to save");
02420         return 0;
02421     }
02422 
02423     imf= scene->r.im_format;
02424     imf.imtype= imtype;
02425 
02426     dx= env->cube[1]->x;
02427 
02428     if (env->type == ENV_CUBE) {
02429         for (i=0; i < 12; i+=2) {
02430             maxX = MAX2(maxX,layout[i] + 1);
02431             maxY = MAX2(maxY,layout[i+1] + 1);
02432         }
02433 
02434         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(maxX*dx, maxY*dx, 24, IB_rectfloat);
02435 
02436         for (i=0; i < 12; i+=2)
02437             if (layout[i] > -1 && layout[i+1] > -1)
02438                 IMB_rectcpy(ibuf, env->cube[i/2], layout[i]*dx, layout[i+1]*dx, 0, 0, dx, dx);
02439     }
02440     else if (env->type == ENV_PLANE) {
02441         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(dx, dx, 24, IB_rectfloat);
02442         IMB_rectcpy(ibuf, env->cube[1], 0, 0, 0, 0, dx, dx);
02443     }
02444     else {
02445         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Invalid environment map type");
02446         return 0;
02447     }
02448 
02449     if (scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT)
02450         ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
02451 
02452     /* to save, we first get absolute path */
02453     BLI_strncpy(filepath, relpath, sizeof(filepath));
02454     BLI_path_abs(filepath, G.main->name);
02455 
02456     ok= BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf, filepath, &imf);
02457 
02458     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02459 
02460     if (ok) {
02461         return TRUE;
02462     }
02463     else {
02464         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error writing environment map.");
02465         return FALSE;
02466     }
02467 }
